programme.title: The Legend Of Tarzan (2016)
programme.desc: A new live-action adventure from director David Yates (Harry Potter films) brings Edgar Rice Burroughs' legendary character back to the big screen. It's been years since the man once known as Tarzan (Alexander Skarsgard --True Blood) left the jungles of Africa behind for a gentrified life as John Clayton III, Lord Greystoke, with his beloved wife, Jane (Margot Robbie --The Wolf of Wall Street) at his side. Now, he has been invited back to the Congo to serve as a trade emissary of Parliament, unaware that he is a pawn in a deadly convergence of greed and revenge, masterminded by the Belgian, Captain Leon Rom (OscarÂ® winner Christoph Waltz). But those behind the murderous plot have no idea what they are about to unleash.

programme.title: King Arthur: Legend Of The Sword
programme.desc: Acclaimed filmmaker Guy Ritchie brings his dynamic style to the epic fantasy action adventure "King Arthur: Legend of the Sword." Starring Charlie Hunnam in the title role, the film is an iconoclastic take on the classic Excalibur myth, tracing Arthur's journey from the streets to the throne. When the child Arthur's father is murdered, Vortigern (Jude Law), Arthur's uncle, seizes the crown. Robbed of his birthright and with no idea who he truly is, Arthur comes up the hard way in the back alleys of the city. But once he pulls the sword from the stone, his life is turned upside down and he is forced to acknowledge his true legacy...whether he likes it or not.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Tutsi teenager, Providence Rwayitare escapes the Rwandan genocide by hiding in a church. In the morning, she manages to flee alone. Years later, settled in Belgium, she founded the Muyira association to combine art and memory, raising public awareness about reconstruction after the tragedy.

programme.title: Bellefond - Le Prix De La Vie
programme.desc: Casal, a young man accused of a murder he did not commit, escapes from prison and seeks out Bellefond to defend him. Bellefond will therefore have to face Colignon, Casal's former lawyer, who cannot bear to be dethroned by another.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi

programme.title: Sami La Fugue

programme.title: La Famille Blaireau-Renard
programme.desc: Edmond is the father of three little badger cubs; all living happily in their sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Everything changes when Marguerite and her daughter move into the den; both families now have to find a way to live together in harmony!

programme.title: Bestioles En Questions
programme.desc: As a nature enthusiast, emilie is very interested in the behaviour of insects and other small creatures. What do ants eat? Why are frogs slimy? Can a tortoise catch a cold? No question goes unasked!

programme.title: Les Metiers
programme.desc: To gain a better understanding of some professions, school children explain jobs to their parents in their own words.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans ca
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Jeux De La Fontaine
programme.desc: Every four years, the best athletes in the animal kingdom gather at the Coubertin Fountain for their own version of the Winter Olympics. Fox, Sheep, She-Wolf, Mouse: they'll all be challenging one another in a series of sporting events in the hope of winning a medal.

programme.title: Partie De Campagne
programme.desc: Surrounded by fields, near a vast forest and a pretty stream, lies the village of Bellefontaine. It's home to the fun-loving gang of friends RaphaÃ«l, Lina, P'tit Pied and Grande Perche. Bubbling over with imagination, they fill every day with exciting adventures.

programme.title: Les Triples

programme.title: Chniwla Et Boubris
programme.desc: Boubris is an introverted lizard who dreams of peace and quiet. A former musician, he fled the hustle and settled away from the world. Until the day Chniwla, a hyperactive and intrusive mosquito, disrupts his daily life.
